DOC.brief_title: RCT : Oropharyngeal Leak Pressure ( OLP ) - Ambu AuraGain v LMA Supreme
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria ASA physical status I III Adults 18 year Ambulatory surgeries general anesthesia supine position require laryngeal mask Knee arthroscopy , bladder tumour resection , hand , eye general surgical procedure Muscle relaxant require Exclusion Criteria Reduced mouth open less 2.5 cm Recent upper respiratory tract infection sore throat last 2 week Contraindications laryngeal mask use morbid obesity BMI 40 severe symptomatic esophageal reflux disease
